description: From nosema disease or directly from translingual Nosema (“a taxonomic genus within the family Nosematidae”), from Latin nosema, from Ancient Greek νόσημᾰ (nósēma, “disease, sickness, plague, affliction”).

entries.meaning: An infectious disease of adult honey bees caused by some microsporidian parasites of the genus Nosema.
(possibly dated) Pébrine, a disease of silkworms, also caused by Nosema parasites.
